abstract: A key in the error dictionary that provides resume data.
overview:
## Discussion

When a transfer error occurs or when you call the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDownloadTask/cancel(byProducingResumeData:)] method, the delegate object or completion handler gets an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] object. If the transfer is resumable, that error object’s `userInfo` dictionary contains a value for this key. To resume the transfer, your app can pass that value to the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/downloadTask(withResumeData:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/downloadTask(withResumeData:completionHandler:)] method.

# NSURLSessionDownloadTaskResumeData

**Global Variable**

A key in the error dictionary that provides resume data.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSURLSessionDownloadTaskResumeData: String
```

## Discussion

When a transfer error occurs or when you call the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDownloadTask/cancel(byProducingResumeData:)] method, the delegate object or completion handler gets an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] object. If the transfer is resumable, that error object’s `userInfo` dictionary contains a value for this key. To resume the transfer, your app can pass that value to the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/downloadTask(withResumeData:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession/downloadTask(withResumeData:completionHandler:)] method.

## User info dictionary keys

- **NSURLErrorBackgroundTaskCancelledReasonKey**: A key in the error dictionary that provides the reason for canceling a background task.
